column4: Definitely a lot more I could put...

column2: Text that has fallen through the black hole is not allowed

column1: [COMMENT] A "hunt" is anything that can be done on at least 3 different bodies

column2: *Any* warp from a black hole to white hole counts. Warping back on a charged pad doesn't.

column1: Eat a marshmallow at $2/3/4/5$ different fire(s)
Talk to $2/3/4/5$ Hearthian traveler(s) outside of [TH]

column2: The "activated" pool is the one that you are standing at. Not the remote one.

column1: Touch the quantum cave shard on [ET]
Touch the quantum grove shard on [TH]
Touch the quantum museum shard on [TH]
Touch the quantum tower shard on [BH]
Refuel your jetpack at $3/4/5$ different canister(s)
column2: Refueling via the canister in your ship counts as 1
You must activate something. Just moving it isn't sufficient.

column1: Touch a [DB] vine on $1/2/3$ different planet(s)
Go through the black hole in [BH]$/ without your ship$
Translate any text inside the electric core of [GD]
Ride one CW tornado and one CCW tornado
Get tornadoed into space on $1/2$ island(s) on GD
Enter the black hole formed inside the ATP

column2: Text at the base of the tower does not count

Get scorched by sun (but don't die to it)
Translate any text in $1/2/3$ different [OPC] module(s)
Translate any text inside Black Hole Forge
Touch a living or dead Jellyfish
Read any text in the museum on [TH]
Repair the satellite in the Zero-G Cave
Translate any text inside Mining Site 2b
Use a storm shelter on Giants Deep
Translate any text inside statue island
column2: Text on the outside does not count

column1: Touch a clothed Nomai corpse on $1/2/3$ bodies
column2: [QM] only counts as 1. Clothed = not just a skeleton

column1: Shoot scout through $1/2$ impassable bramble seed(s)

column2: Must find and talk to both children

column1: Land a Nomai Ship on any location different than its takeoff

column2: If doing the [ATP] method, you may not "set up" your file before the timer starts
(Remove the warp core from [ATP] and then die)
(Remove the warp core from [ATP] and then outrun the supernova)
(Remove the warp core from [ATP] and then await the supernova at the 6th [QM] location)
